ability.Shadow Shield: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.
ability.Spectral Boost: When this Pokemon lands a hit, it raises its Special Attack by 1 stage.

Psychic.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Spe by 1 stage.

Moonblast.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's SpA by 1 stage.

Phantom Wave.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Lunar Barrier.effect: Raises the user's special defense and defense by 1 stage for three turns.

Soul Drain.effect: Heals the user for half the damage dealt.
